item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping of mattress base on pavement, 17th December
item.description:
Mattress base flytipped and partially blocking pavement at the top end of Milestone Road, where it meets Church Rd, just outside Stratos Heights flats.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Milestone Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 17th December
item.description:
Pothole is near roundabout towards Sidcup
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1A, Foots Cray Lane, Albany Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lighting not working, 17th December
item.description:
The whole park doesn't have any lamp post working. Every so often the park gets completely dark. A recurrent issue that has not been amended yet.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ridge Close, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet
